mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_COMM (COMM_SEQ, COMM_REF, COMM_CONTENTS, COMM_REG_ID, COMM_REG_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_FREE_COMM.NEXTVAL, #{commRef}, #{commContents},'aaa', SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT COMM_SEQ, COMM_REF, COMM_CONTENTS, COMM_REG_ID, COMM_REG_DATE, COMM_UPDATE FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY COMM_SEQ DESC)AS RNUM, COMM_SEQ, COMM_REF, COMM_CONTENTS, COMM_REG_ID, TO_CHAR(COMM_REG_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS COMM_REG_DATE, TO_CHAR(COMM_UPDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS COMM_UPDATE FROM FREE_COMM WHERE COMM_REF = #{commRef} ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ${start} AND ${end}
mapper.update: UPDATE FREE_COMM SET COMM_CONTENTS = #{commContents}, COMM_UPDATE = SYSDATE WHERE COMM_SEQ = #{commSeq}
